body: Wo don't generate version numbers with pluses in them as far as I know?

I generate syncthing builds with specific configurations.  
To differentiate them from vanilla builds right now I use e.g. `vX.Y.Z-noupgrade` which is technically incorrect semver because `noupgrade` is not a part of the version but rather "build meta information".

Difference is that meta is not included in version checks and pre-release part is.

issue.title: lib/build: Allow semver build in version regex (fixes #9267)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

issue.title: build.go: validate -version argument against regex from lib/build
issue.body:
In #9267 it was mentioned that binaries built with incompatible versions can't be run.  
To avoid situations like this completely, same regex is used to validate manually provided versions.
